body_html:
@ispirmustafa ok, I'll move changes into contrib, as well as a separate helper method as example.

I think A good example of usage with MonitoredSession would be similar to MonitoredTrainingSession, because the interface of MonitoredTrainingSession is more user friendly than MonitoredSession. I would probably wrap MonitoredSession and hooks up in something like, if not use directly, MonitoredTrainingSession in my code.

please see PartialRestoreSession in partial_restore_session.py.
